Interface of the Client Session.

Method Detail

getReadTimeout

int getReadTimeout()
returns the timeout that is used while reading the server response data.

Returns:
read timeout (in milliseconds)

isConnected

boolean isConnected()
Indicates whether a connection to a server is established or not.

Returns:
true, if the connection to a server is established, false otherwise

connect

void connect(java.lang.String host,
             int port)
             throws java.io.IOException
Established the connection to a server.

Parameters:
host - IP address of the server
port - port to be used for the connection to server
Throws:
java.io.IOException - setting the read timeout fails or writer / reader for messages uses not supported encoding

disconnect

void disconnect()
                throws java.io.IOException
Disconnects the client from the server.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - closing the connection to the server fails

addObserver

void addObserver(IClientSessionNotifications notifier)
Adds an observer that is notified when events occur.

Parameters:
notifier - the methods to be called when an event occurs

removeObserver

void removeObserver(IClientSessionNotifications notifier)
Removes an observer.

Parameters:
notifier - the method that should no longer called when an event occurs
